Please add the following classes to the html tag: lt-ie10, lt-ie9 and lt-ie8

For HTML5 compatibility, Please add the following into you head tag: <!--[if lt IE 10]><script type="text/javascript"> document.createElement('header'); document.createElement('section'); document.createElement('footer'); document.createElement('article'); document.createElement('aside'); document.createElement('hgroup'); document.createElement('nav'); document.createElement('figure'); document.createElement('figcaption'); </script><![endif]-->
